title: Rank Wiped after downloading patch 6.8
body:
Good morning all,

I just finished updating the 6.8 patch and it seems my **rank has been wiped?** I play on the OCE server.
I was Gold V ~50 LP and now I am unranked and says I need to do my placements.
I was playing ranked at midnight last night before I went to sleep, woke up,** updated** and now it is reset.

Has this happened to anyone else after the update? 
What do I do, support ticket categories don't come under any problems associated with your account rank or similar to that.

EDIT: Further information. It seems the client was 'reset' as well, the beginner tips box that pops up in champ select etc popped up again. I had the 'Don't show this again' marked on it forever ago.

_**BUG HAS BEEN FIXED**_

replies.body: Yeah I had the same problem. Was going to play some ranked today, I logged in and it said i was in my placements, but below it said I had won 73 lost 58. I played a ranked game after this, which i lost :( but the problem seemed to go away for me after that. It put me back into my correct rank with the correct amount of LP. I think you just have to play a game of ranked for it to reset.
